ygData.subject: Re: Guild quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been a Bard in Freeport for a long time and have trained under Caskin Marshead for all of my 5 (soon to be 6) Levels. and he has not given me the time
ygData.messageBody:
I have been a Bard in Freeport for a long time and have trained under
Caskin Marshead for all of my 5 (soon to be 6) Levels. and he has not given
me the time of day so far. the same holds for the rest of the Freeport's
Bards guild. But I have found quests from the Palatines in the Hall of Truth
(which will get one in hot water with the Freeport Militia and a search for
a blade called 'Soulfire') and the priests of the Temple of Marr (better get
your sea legs ready it may require a LONG boat trip)..

-SnowLynx - Gentlemen Bard of Freeport...
-----Original Message-----
From: Glen Colby [mailto:voidchld@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 12:28 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Guild quests



Hello friends and fellow adventurers, my name is Talonstar, A not so
numble bard from the dimension of E'ci. I have one question. Has anyone
received a quest from the guildmaster (Caskin Marsheart) in freeport?
